On July 11, a media outlet reported that a disabled farmer in Taizhou slaughtered his own pigs and sold them for 700 yuan. He was investigated and fined 50,000 yuan. He later received legal aid and his fine was reduced to 5,000 yuan.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of July 11, Changsha, Hunan.
It was reported online that someone robbed a bank. A large number of special police vehicles appeared under the overpass at the intersection of Fenglin Road and Yulan Road in the West Station, and dozens of special police officers were armed.
According to the reporter's interview, the police officer said that someone called the police on the morning of the 11th and said that he wanted to rob a bank. After receiving the alarm, the police rushed to the scene as soon as possible.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
My Youtube channel was just launched yesterday, and today the comment section has started to have a group of trolls.
To be honest, I really think the country's finances should not be used for this kind of thing.
In fact, if the funds for the trolls were replaced with real practical things to care for and treat their compatriots well, then people on the Internet inside the wall would not be so angry now.
My voice alone will not change anything. What you should really be afraid of is the voice of the people.

On July 11, some netizens found that in the store distribution information of the Bulgari brand official website, the word "China" was added before Hong Kong and Macau, but not before Taiwan.
This behavior triggered netizens' doubts about insulting China
Afterwards, Bulgari topped the Weibo hot search

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Netizens added that this time Bulgari's insult to China stemmed from a dispute in the mobile game fan circle.
